title: Computer Science Student
description: Developed ,managed and directed the front-end development of an Android application in a team of 4 people. Great use and deepening of Android Studio (Java), GitHub (Pull Requests, Issues, Merge conflicts).
Developed the front-end side of a Python Flask website. Managed server-side data (REST API) and frontend-backend communications using GitHub as Version Control.

title: Front-End Developer
description: Developed and designed 10+ projects for Frontend Mentor, a website that provides free design and coding challenges for web developers. The projects are developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and SASS.
